title: That moment when your 2/10/2 hiemerdinger rushes down the nexus in ranked...
body:
granted after our crazy ass varus gets a penta-kill on our own nexus.... also varus did SO MUCH FKING DAMAGE

that game was just the most crazy shit.....

varus's build:
{{item:3142}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3156}} 

he did almost more damage to champs than my entire team combined..... not really, but 81k damage to champions is a shit ton for a varus mid

tl;dr varus carried, hiemer blew up the nexus
